1619980.name: Operator - Northridge Park
1619980.description:
Explore the new map, Northridge Park, as you once again try to collect all 8 pages while avoiding the hostile entity. Work with your team of up to 4 players, finding new landmarks such as the graveyard, reservoir, and fountain in this exciting and mysterious location.


**** EARLY ACCESS DLC! ****

Along with the base game, please note that this DLC is also considered to be in early access. Content upon purchase is likely to be updated, including changes to this new map (i.e., added gadgets, new characters) as time progresses. Purchasing this content helps further development and supports me as an independent creator.
